use_cases_desc:
Inspect and analyze brain scans on a large wall. A user/anatomist can change the view on the large wall by pointing a 6DoF pen at a tangible 3D model of a brain.

Flexible and distributed rendering of a scene graph across multiple screens/devices. A screen can render a portion of the scene graph, therefore allowing to extend screen real-estate across multiple screens.
evaluation: Heuristic evaluation (criteria); Comparison to related work
contribution_desc: Shared Substance is a data-oriented programming model that allows for flexible sharing of physically connected resources, user created content, system elements (network connections), application state, and functionality.
use_cases: Medicine; Any application that benefits from content distribution
interaction_techniques: Visualisation; Data transfer/sharing; UI distribution; Remote control
